wikitext.*:
'''Ruth Helen Swycaffer Noel''' (born [[1947]]) has written two books relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works; ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' and ''[[The Mythology of Middle-earth]]''. She has also written science-fiction novels under the name '''Atanielle Annyn Noël'''.
